mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.update:
UPDATE movie SET movie_name = #{movie_name}, movie_post = #{movie_post}, movie_en_name = #{movie_en_name}, reservation_in_progress = #{reservation_in_progress}, reservation_rate = #{reservation_rate}, director = #{director}, casting_actor = #{casting_actor}, genre = #{genre}, view_age = #{view_age}, made_country = #{made_country}, release_date = #{release_date}, description_movie = #{description_movie}, movie_chart = #{movie_chart}
WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM movie WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie ( movie_name, movie_post, movie_en_name, reservation_in_progress, reservation_rate, director, casting_actor, genre, view_age, made_country, release_date, description_movie, movie_chart, delYN ) VALUE ( #{movie_name}, #{movie_post}, #{movie_en_name}, #{reservation_in_progress}, #{reservation_rate}, #{director}, #{casting_actor}, #{genre}, #{view_age}, #{made_country}, #{release_date}, #{description_movie}, #{movie_chart}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE movie SET delYN = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
